owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._user: The address of the user who wants to pay for creating a question.

params.user: The address of the user who wants to pay for voting on a question.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._cost: The new cost of creating a question

params._newApi: The new address of the question API.

params._cost: The new cost of voting for a question

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

payForCreateQuestion(address,uint256).notice: Makes a user pay for creating a question.  We transfer the funds from the user executing the function to  the contract.

payForVoting(address,uint256).notice: Makes a user pay for voting on a question.  We transfer the funds from the user executing the function to  the contract.

setCreateCost(uint256).notice: Changes the cost of creating a question

setQuestionApi(address).notice: Sets the address of the question API.

setVoteCost(uint256).notice: Changes the cost of voting for a question
